title: Sun and Power
caption: Taken from the back driveway of my partnerâ€™s former apartment, where we spent some lovely times together

image.description: a typical Chicago apartment building with the wooden staircase in the back is basked in the evening sun. In the foreground a power pole stands with electrical wires running off of it in all directions, crisscrossing across the entire scene except for the top left quadrant
